source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ISNULL(
(SELECT Release_Date FROM dbo.ELTControl
where Release_Date = CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126) 
), '1900-01-01') as Release_Date

SELECT CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126) as today
FROM dbo.ELTControl

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
ItemName + 'xxx' as Item from
[dbo].[srcTableA]
where cost > @{pipeline().parameters.cost}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select  
[ItemName],
[ItemSkew],
12 as cost
from [dbo].[srcTableA]
where ItemName = 'Comic2'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		value as (etag as string, id as string, name as string, properties as (annotations as string[], description as string, folder as (name as string), linkedServiceName as (referenceName as string, type as string), parameters as (Container as (type as string), Directory as (type as string), FileName as (defaultValue as string, type as string), SinkContainer as (type as string), SinkDirectory as (type as string), fileName as (type as string)), schema as string, type as string, typeProperties as (columnDelimiter as string, compressionCodec as string, escapeChar as string, firstRowAsHeader as boolean, location as (fileName as string, fileSystem as string, folderPath as string, type as string), quoteChar as string, relativeUrl as string, schema as string, table as string)), type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> srcDS
srcDS foldDown(unroll(value.properties.annotations, value),
	mapColumn(
		etag = value.etag,
		id = value.id,
		name = value.name,
		description = value.properties.description,
		folder = value.properties.folder.name,
		linkedServiceName = value.properties.linkedServiceName.referenceName,
		parameters = value.properties.parameters,
		schema = value.properties.schema,
		ds_type = value.properties.type,
		ds_typeProperties = value.properties.typeProperties.location.fileName,
		type = value.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		etag,
		id,
		name,
		description,
		folder,
		linkedServiceName,
		schema,
		ds_type,
		ds_typeProperties,
		type
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ItemName as string,
		ItemSkew as string,
		DatePurchase as timestamp,
		DateReturned as timestamp,
		cost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select\nItemName, ItemSkew, DatePurchase, DateReturned, cost\nfrom\n [dbo].[srcTableA]',
	format: 'query') ~> srcTableA
srcTableA alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> upsert
upsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as integer,
		ItemName as string,
		ItemSkew as string,
		DatePurchase as timestamp,
		DateReturned as timestamp,
		cost as decimal(19,4),
		DateLoaded as timestamp,
		DateUpdated as timestamp,
		DateDeleted as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ItemSkew'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemName,
		ItemSkew,
		DatePurchase,
		DateReturned,
		cost
	)) ~> tgtTableB

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'ip_address',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 20,
		id
	)) ~> srcrawparquet
srcrawparquet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'ingest',
	folderPath: 'delta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
